name: Roots of Pain(t)
description:
An angry gardener whose only mission is to kill all the living plants in their garden 🥕

A survivors-like game with some fine art made in the amazing MSPaint software. Survive as long as you can while fighting hordes of evil vegetables. Level up, unlock powerful skills and mow your way through the garden!

Créditos

  • Programming, design, art: Carlos, Miguel, Pablo, Luis
  • Music & sound: Rosa
